org.trellisldp.http

Class MultipartUploader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trellisldp.http.MultipartUploader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter, javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseFilter

    @PreMatching
 @Provider
 @Priority(value=2010)
 @Singleton
 @Path(value="upload/{id}")
public class MultipartUploader
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter, javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseFilter

      • listUploads

        @GET
 @Timed
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String listUploads(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                      java.lang.String id)
        Get a list of the uploads.

        Note: the response structure will be like this:

        {
   "1": "somehash",
   "2": "otherhash",
   "3": "anotherhash"
 }
        Parameters:
        id - the upload id
        Returns:
        a response

      • createBinary

        @POST
 @Timed
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createBinary(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                 java.io.InputStream input)
        Create a binary from a collection of uploaded parts.

        Note: The structure should be like this:

        {
   "1": "somehash",
   "2": "otherhash",
   "3": "anotherhash"
 }
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier
        input - the input value
        Returns:
        a response

      • uploadPart

        @PUT
 @Timed
 @Path(value="{partNumber}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String uploadPart(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="partNumber")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer partNumber,
                                                                                                                  java.io.InputStream part)
        Add a segment of a binary.

        Note: the response will be a json structure, such as:

        {
    "digest": "a-hash"
  }
        Parameters:
        id - the upload session identifier
        partNumber - the part number
        part - the input stream
        Returns:
        a response
